md:
giải nghĩa từ "patrol" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ tương tự.

* Patrol (noun)
	+ Meaning: A group of people who are sent to an area to keep watch and make sure that everything is safe and in order.
	+ Example: The police patrol the streets at night to prevent crime.
	+ Related words: guard, watch, monitor, surveillance
	+ Synonyms: squad, team, unit, detail

* Patrol (verb)
	+ Meaning: To walk or move around an area to keep watch and make sure that everything is safe and in order.
	+ Example: The police patrol the streets at night to prevent crime.
	+ Related words: guard, watch, monitor, surveillance
	+ Synonyms: cruise, prowl, range, scout

* Patrol (noun) in military context
	+ Meaning: A small group of soldiers who are sent to an area to gather information or to attack the enemy.
	+ Example: The patrol was sent to scout out the enemy's position.
	+ Related words: reconnaissance, scouting, surveillance
	+ Synonyms: squad, team, unit, detail

* Patrol (verb) in military context
	+ Meaning: To move around an area to gather information or to attack the enemy.
	+ Example: The patrol patrolled the border to prevent enemy infiltration.
	+ Related words: reconnaissance, scouting, surveillance
	+ Synonyms: cruise, prowl, range, scout
html:
